content.question: Which of the following is the best example of a behavior reinforced on a variable-interval schedule?

choices.label: Tae sends an important text message to her boss to ask if she can miss work to attend a game. She keeps checking her phone to see if her boss has responded because she does not know how long it will take for them to respond.

Ximena responds to surveys on a website because the site offers occasional cash rewards for completing surveys. She responds to a large number of surveys on the site because she does not know how many she must complete to earn the cash rewards.
Cody sells cell phones and monthly home internet subscriptions, earning $50 for every three phones sold and $100 for every five subscriptions sold.
Alexander arrives at the train station at 7:00 a.m. every day because his train arrives at 7:05 a.m.

content.answer: Tae sends an important text message to her boss to ask if she can miss work to attend a game. She keeps checking her phone to see if her boss has responded because she does not know how long it will take for them to respond.
